member.name: T:ADN.Extensions.Base64Extensions
member.summary: A static class of methods for Base64 strings.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.Base64Extensions.Base64Encode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the value of a plain text string to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.
member.returns: String encoded with base-64 digits.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.Base64Extensions.Base64Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified string, which encodes binary data as base-64 digits, to an equivalent plain text string.
member.returns: Plain text string.

member.name: T:ADN.Extensions.ByteExtensions
member.summary: A static class of extension methods for .

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.ByteExtensions.BytesToHexa(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Converts the numeric value of a byte array to its equivalent hexadecimal string.
member.returns: Hexadecimal string.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.ByteExtensions.HexaToBytes(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts the hexadecimal string to its quivalent numeric value byte array.
member.returns: Byte array.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.ByteExtensions.BytesToString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decodes a sequence of bytes from the specified byte array into a string.
member.param: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.
member.returns: A string that contains the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.ByteExtensions.StringToBytes(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes a set of characters into a sequence of bytes.
member.param: The character array containing the characters to encode.
member.returns: A byte array containing the results of encoding the specified set of characters.

member.name: T:ADN.Extensions.StringExtensions
member.summary: A static class of extension methods for .

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.StringExtensions.Left(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.
member.param: String expression from which the leftmost characters are returned.
Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return.
member.returns: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the left side of a string.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.StringExtensions.Mid(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string that contains a specified number of characters starting from a specified position in a string.
member.param: String expression from which characters are returned.
Starting position of the characters to return.
member.returns: A string that consists of the specified number of characters starting from the specified position in the string.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.StringExtensions.Right(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the right side of a string.
member.param: String expression from which the rightmost characters are returned.
Numeric expression indicating how many characters to return.
member.returns: Returns a string containing a specified number of characters from the right side of a string.

member.name: M:ADN.Extensions.StringExtensions.TrimNonPrintableAscii(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string without the non-printable ASCII characters from a string (characters between space and tilde).
member.param: String to remove the non-printable ASCII characters.
member.returns: A string without the non-printable ASCII characters from a string (characters between space and tilde).
